metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23332 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description: A heap-based buffer overflow exists in the AP4_StdcFileByteStream::ReadPartial component located in /StdC/Ap4StdCFileByteStream.cpp of Bento4 version 06c39d9. This issue can lead to a denial of service (DOS).

notes.Note: alexmurray> kodi-inputstream-adaptive contains an embedded copy of bento4

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
